review: Fire TV delivers what is advertised and I love it. Connection and set-up are simple. Logging into my router and into Amazon was required only once (during set-up). After the initial set-up one merely has to turn on the television and press the Fire TV remote. The streaming is uninterrupted and provides great picture and sound quality. Compared to another brand of streaming video devices that I own, Fire TV wins hands down. Amazon alone has thousands of TV and movie options and Fire TV is the perfect companion to my Amazon Prime account. There are plenty of other options for streaming video, but I haven't explored all of them - Amazon has provided plenty of selections so far. Fire TV will replace my cable TV when the cable contract expires.I have yet to try out the voice search or using my Fire tablet in conjunction with Fire TV, but am pleased to have those options.
